subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
The purpose of this business proposal is to alert you of the Global
diversification quest which you have the opportunity to take advantage
of, if you have a business investment project that lacks funding.
My clients are presently seeking international portfolio
diversification as a business expansion strategy. They are currently
interested in debt finance only [pure loan] without any sector or
regional restrictions and ready to facilitate and fund any business
that is capable of generating at least 3% annual return on investment.
Below are brief on the Investment Portfolio:
  Minimum and Maximum Funding: $1 Million to $400 Million USD
  Placement Opens to: Entrepreneurs, Corporations and Investors
  Funding Type: Loan Investment
  Term: 2-15 years - Repayment/ Renewable tenure
Based on the above information, we shall be glad to receive your
Project Plan/Executive Summary in a compatible format
(PDF-recommended) for our review. if you have any project funding need
and interested to discuss further
Regards
Mr. Ashley Barley
Chief Operating Officer
Caspian Point One, Pierhead Street,
Cadiff CF10 4DQ,
United Kingdom
/www.creditsafe.com

subject: Re:   Dear Sir,
body:
Hello Mr. Ashley Barley,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this intriguing business proposal. It's quite interesting to hear about your clients' willingness to fund projects that can generate a substantial annual return.

Could you please provide more details about the kind of projects your clients are interested in? Are there any specific industries or sectors they prefer? Also, what is the minimum and maximum amount they are willing to invest?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
June
